code_descriptions.safety: Captures discussions where participants highlight the perceived benefit of enhanced safety through the use of search and rescue robots, emphasizing the reduction of risk to human rescuers by deploying robots in hazardous situations.
code_descriptions.reduced risk: Captures instances where participants highlight the perceived benefit of minimizing additional danger to human rescuers by deploying robots in hazardous search and rescue operations.
code_descriptions.efficiency: Captures perceptions of enhanced operational efficiency in search and rescue scenarios, where robots are seen as potentially more capable and effective than human responders in navigating hazardous environments and performing tasks swiftly.
